properties.displayName: Storage accounts should have shared access signature (SAS) policies configured
properties.description: Ensure storage accounts have shared access signature (SAS) expiration policy enabled. Users use a SAS to delegate access to resources in Azure Storage account. And SAS expiration policy recommend upper expiration limit when a user creates a SAS token.

metadata.description: Audit allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. Deny blocks the resource creation and update. Disable turns off the policy.
